row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 14)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
col_desc: Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
Queen has two mini challenge wins.
